item.title: Start programming
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: A personal journey of discovering programming, from initial struggles and frustration to finding passion and purpose in coding. Learn about perseverance and finding what you truly love despite challenges.
